title: Saturday Boredom Busters
text:
October 23,   
Little ghosts and goblins can go trick-or-treating at the Great Plains Zoo this weekend. ZooBoo is a non-scary Halloween event that includes more than 300 hand-carved lit Jack-o-lanterns, the extinct species graveyard, plus a treat tents. ZooBoo runs from 3:30 to 7 p.m. today and Sunday. The cost is $6, $5 for zoo members. 
Enjoy a ghoulish good time in downtown Sioux Falls for the 10th annual Zombie Walk. Registration goes from 11 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. at Skelly's. It costs $3 to participate, $5 for Zombie make-up. The parade begins at 5 p.m. It's free to watch the parade. 
The Fraternal Order of Police is hosting a haunted house in Sioux Falls called Twisted Nightmare from 7 p.m. to midnight. Admission is $6, $5 with a canned food donation. The haunted house is located at 2601 S. Louise. 
The Sioux Falls Jaycees Haunted House goes from 7 p.m. to midnight at the Fine Arts Building at the W.H. Lyon Fairgrounds. Admission is $8, $6 with a canned food donation. A $16 fast pass lets you jump to the front of the line. 
Haunted Farm in Worthing is 25 acres of screaming fear featuring The Loft of Lunatics, Spooks in the Dark and the Shadows Hayride. The hours are from 6 p.m. to midnight. From Sioux Falls, go south on I-29 and take exit 68 and go east 3.5 miles. 
The Sioux Empire Kennel Club is hosting a Conformation & Obedience Dog Show in the Expo Building at the W.H. Lyon Fairgrounds. The hours are from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m. both today and Sunday. Today's events include a parade with dogs dressed in Halloween costumes at 4 p.m. Admission is free. 
Sioux Falls Christian Schools are hosting a Fall Benefit for the Center of Hope. Activities include a dinner, a live and silent auction, plus items ranging from gift cards to weekend trips. The benefit goes 5:30 to 9 p.m. Sioux Falls Christian Schools are located at 6120 S. Charger Circle. 
Good News Reformed Church is hosting a Fall Festival from 4:30 to 7:30 p.m. Activities include trunk or treat, a soup & pie supper, chili tasting, a silent auction and kids carnival. All proceeds will benfit the church's missionary in Argentina. Good News Reformed is located at 1800 S. Valley View Road in Sioux Falls. 
The Homestead Orchard near Parker, SD will be buzzing with fun events including a live bee demonstration from noon to 2 p.m. You can also sample apples, cider and caramel dip. The orchard is located at 279th Street and 449th Avenue southwest of Parker. 
Augustana Lutheran Church in Sioux Falls is hosting Fall Bazaar from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. The bazaar includes baked goods, lefse, rosettes, attic treasures and crafts plus a soup & pie lunch. Augustana Lutheran is located at 7th & Prairie. 
Hillcrest Church in Sioux Falls is hosting a Craft Bazaar & Bake Sale from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. Crafters include knit and crotcheted items, jewelry, woodwork, artwork and holiday decorations. All proceeds benefit the Powerhouse Tutoring Center, which serves students from Whittier Middle School. Hillcrest Church is located at 4301 E. 26th Street.
